config.name: StandardLogin
config.description: The default login mechanism for PHPDevShell, can be overwritten to use customized plugin.
config.author: Jason Schoeman
config.info: The default login mechanism for PHPDevShell is a simple plugin allowing users to login and be approved with their matching database details. After login an authentication session will be created allowing further access. This plugin can be replicated to allow another login type like LDAP for instance.
